DIA_Javad_VZ_Ambient_03_04: First thing I'll do when I get out is get drunk. Maybe that way I'll forget about this place...
DIA_Javad_VZ_Ambient_03_03: Now even a common stone can attack us. I'm sick of this place.
DIA_Javad_VZ_Ambient_03_02: I'll be honest. Landing on this island, I didn't expect to fight the undead in a tomb...
DIA_Javad_VZ_Ambient_03_01: I can handle it. Be careful, I sense death in the air.
